TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CngAlgorithm extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm>
Public NotInheritable Class CngAlgorithm Implements IEquatable(Of CngAlgorithm)

summary.span: 封装加密算法的名称。

span.span: Encapsulates the name of an encryption algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个实用工具类。The class is a utility class. 它包含静态属性、比较方法和私有的、内部维护的算法名称字符串。It consists of static properties, comparison methods, and a private, internally maintained, algorithm name string. 静态属性返回对象。The static properties return objects. 每个对象的内部字符串都初始化为与静态属性的名称相对应的算法名称。Each object's internal string is initialized to the algorithm name that corresponds to the name of the static property. 你还可以使用此类为静态属性未涵盖的算法类型创建对象。You can also use this class to create objects for algorithm types that are not covered by the static properties. 下一代加密技术 (CNG) 类 (如) 通过 `algorithm`参数接受对象。Several Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) classes (such as ) accept objects through an `algorithm` parameter. 当类接收对象时, 它通过调用对象的属性来检索嵌入的算法名称。When the class receives the object, it retrieves the embedded algorithm name by calling the object's property. 因此, 用作已知算法的枚举。Therefore, serves as an enumeration of well-known algorithms. 使用强类型化值 (而不是字符串), 可以指定众所周知的算法。It lets you specify a well-known algorithm by using a strongly typed value instead of a string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string algorithm) cil managed

param.name: algorithm
param.span: 要初始化的算法的名称。

span.span: The name of the algorithm to initialize.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的实例在内部维护`algorithm`参数指定的算法名称。 Instances of the class internally maintain the algorithm name that is specified by the `algorithm` parameter. 此构造函数的主要目的是提供一种方法, 用于为不是由类的静态属性表示的算法类型创建对象。The primary purpose of this constructor is to provide a method for creating objects for algorithm types that are not represented by the static properties of the class. 此容量使未来[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]版本、service pack 和第三方开发人员能够添加新算法, 这些算法可以像当前可用的算法一样进行访问。This capacity enables future [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] releases, service packs, and third-party developers to add new algorithms, which can be accessed just like the algorithms that are currently available.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter length is 0 (zero).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Algorithm As String
public: property System::String ^ Algorithm { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个新的 对象，它指定消息摘要 5 (MD5) 哈希算法。

span.span: Gets a new object that specifies the Message Digest 5 (MD5) hash algorithm.

value.span: 一个指定 MD5 算法的对象。

span.span: An object that specifies the MD5 algorithm.

remarks.span: 由于 MD5 发生冲突, Microsoft 建议使用基于 SHA256 的安全模型。

span.span: Due to collision problems with MD5, Microsoft recommends a security model based on SHA256.
